title: Love Island's Danny Williams calls Jourdan Riane a liar as he says he was 100% faithful
text:

Danny Williams has hit back at his former flame Jourdan Williams amid bitter split.

The Love Island hunk broke his silence to insist he had been "100 percent faithful" to hi ex in a ferocious Instagram post on Wednesday.

Jourdan confirmed she had split from her model beau after he had shown her a "lack of respect, disloyalty and dishonesty".

Cheating claims were swirling that Danny had been out on the town with a bevy of beautiful girls.

Danny was savage when he sensationally claimed his ex was lying about the reason behind their split.

(Image: Instagram)

In a lengthy message, he penned: "I would also like to make it crystal clear that I was 100% faithful to Jourdan, and this is genuinely not the reason why we have broken up, despite what has already been said. This is something that we felt was the right decision for the both of us.

"I would like to say thank you to everyone who has been understanding of the situation, and who has personally supported us both through this difficult time.

"My time spent with Jourdan was honestly one of my most happiest, and I would like to wish her the best moving forward."

(Image: Instagram)

Danny admitted he was "honestly devastated" his relationship with Jourdan didn't pan out as they had planned.

The hunk reiterated it was a "huge shame" the couple couldn't make their love work.

He added: "I would like to express that I am honestly devastated that this relationship has come to an end and it is a huge shame that we couldn’t make things work. "

(Image: ITV)

His post comes after Jourdan addressed the claims she had split from Danny amid the swirling rumours he was cheating on her.

Sharing a snap of herself looking sensational, the 24 year-old penned a lengthy caption to explain her position and reassure fans she's doing fine.

"I have to respect me first," Jourdan wrote, "I genuinely had such a great time in my relationship and I don't regret the decisions I've made as far as choosing to give someone a chance however, I have boundaries."

It was reported yesterday that Jourdan had decided to give her model beau the boot after accusing him of chatting with other girls while out on the town.

A source told The Sun : "Jourdan and Danny have had a few ups and downs since leaving the show but they had been getting on great recently and Jourdan was so happy.

"Things changed in the last few weeks though and Danny started acting distant and started going on more nights out.

The couple had a lot of promise after meeting on Love Island as they moved in together in September.
description: Love Island's Danny has called out his former flame Jourdan as he denied claims he cheated on her in wake of their split
